history.content:
Recruiting AMA FB
Feeling unsure of what to do next due to the recent coronavirus outbreak? HKN is hosting an AMA (Ask Me Anything) with recruiters from SambaNova, LiveRamp, Riot Games, and IBM to address any questions or concerns you might have in regards to the impact of the current pandemic. Everyone is welcome! RSVP: https://forms.gle/NiVepbMboffqXrBLA

Location: berkeley.zoom.us/j/91957223643
Date: Mon, April 20, 2020
Time: 5 p.m. to 6:30 p.m.
Cerebras Online Info Session FB
Andy Hock, Head of Product will give a talk on: “Accelerate Deep Learning at Wafer Scale!”
Talk Abstract: AI has great potential for commercial and scientific applications, but is compute-limited today. Researchers continue to make progress in deep learning by training larger models with larger datasets. But training times for these models often take days or weeks.In this talk we introduce Cerebras Systems and our approach to speed up training, reduce time to solution with the Cerebras Wafer Scale Engine -- the largest chip in the world -- and the CS-1 system for the datacenter.

Location: https://zoom.us/u/aeoV4UdFv
Date: Wed, April 22, 2020
Time: 6 p.m. to 7:30 p.m.
Secrets Behind Your Uber Eats Delivery FB
Come learn how a data scientist from China came to work on some of the most important technology in modern-day food delivery. The event will be a Zoom call where Mo Zhou talks through her journey working on different continents to become a senior level data scientist at UberEats. She'll talk about the different work environments in China and the United States, while also discussing some of the algorithms behind their multi-million app. It'll be a hour-long with time in the end for any questions you may have.

Location: zoom and https://www.facebook.com/events/246799600004541
Date: Thu, April 23, 2020
Time: 6 p.m. to 7 p.m.
history.subject: Career Events of the Week
